"A.D.2028/xx/xx/xx:xx": "Speaking of which, Las Vegas has come under multiple attacks but... why hasn't Mother attacked directly underground?"
"Looking back on Bethor’s behavior, I was expecting explosions underground. It's a bit unexpected, or rather... terrifying."
"It just means that the director’s rampage in Tokyo was just an exception. That also seems likely as to why he was purged."
"Indeed... Mother Cluster seems to avoid taking actions that harm Earth itself. We've witnessed this often."
"And even if they wanted to attack, they may not know the exact location underground."
"In other words, instead of causing large scale destruction, it’s faster to lure us out with small outbursts."
"That said, they’re ambushing us again and again... It wouldn’t be strange if they’ve grown tired of this by now."
"Phantom readings detected! ...As well as the readings of several people."
"Speak of the devil, huh... No matter, we'll intercept them."
"Enga... I know I can't change your mind, but... be careful."
"If you're going to encourage me, at least do it honestly, huh?"
"You're going to be fighting people. This is different from the fight against Bethor."
"This is a real fight. Can you really do it? Can you cut down and kill another person?"
"O-Of course! I'll take down every last member of Mother Cluster!"
